item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Indiana police are seizing FedEx packages containing cash (37 points | 13 comments)
2. Nyxpsi – A Next-Gen Network Protocol for Extreme Packet Loss (97 points | 39 comments)
3. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (52 points | 24 comments)
4. FreeBSD 13.4-Release Announcement (50 points | 7 comments)
5. The reason why music is getting worse (18 points | 31 comments)
6. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (263 points | 128 comments)
7. K340A: The Brain Computer of Chernobyl Duga Radar [video] (105 points | 22 comments)
8. Y Combinator is predicated on startups that require low capitalization (74 points | 38 comments)
9. Franzelio: Draw Lines. Make Music. Share Your Instrument (33 points | 12 comments)
10. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (884 points | 1031 comments)
11. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (138 points | 6 comments)
12. Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump (77 points | 34 comments)
13. Dissecting the gzip format (2011) (20 points | 2 comments)
14. Mecanum Wheel (26 points | 7 comments)
15. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (164 points | 116 comments)
16. Finetune, Eval, Deploy 60 LLMs in a single Colab notebook (13 points | discuss)
17. Michigan Micro Mote (M3) makes history as the smallest computer (2015) (7 points | 2 comments)
18. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (123 points | 30 comments)
19. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (341 points | 246 comments)
20. Provable Security of Linux-DRBG in the Seedless Robustness Model [pdf] (26 points | 2 comments)
21. The Pragmatic Programmer for Machine Learning (95 points | 9 comments)
22. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (179 points | 36 comments)
23. Titan Submersible Marine Board of Investigation (5 points | 1 comment)
24. S6 – skarnet's small supervision suite (77 points | 26 comments)
25. The internet is worse than it used to be. How did we get here? (11 points | discuss)
26. How to succeed in MrBeast production (Leaked PDF) (1924 points | 1230 comments)
27. Fractran: Computer architecture based on the multiplication of fractions (88 points | 17 comments)
28. Show HN: Sisi – Semantic Image Search CLI tool, locally without third party APIs (108 points | 38 comments)
29. Ask HN: Does anyone use sound effects in their dev environment? (189 points | 269 comments)
30. Show HN: JAQT – JavaScript Queries and Transformations (87 points | 27 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 3:15 AM UTC
